ValidationRule.description: When Status is Instructed then Content Creation Updated = False
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Instructing"), OR( Content_Creation_Updated__c = false ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please ensure that you update the fields using the "Update Listing Content" button provided above before changing the Property Valuation status to 'Instructing'.
